name: Killer Whale: Orca Simulator 3D Free
description:
Play as a killer whale with this survival simulator! Explore undewater world being an Orca and hunt for fish! Swim in the sea, hunt for smaller fish and meet other animals! Try Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D! Swim, hunt and have fun! Play as an Orca and explore arctic sea with this survival simulator!

Enjoy this underwater survival simulator living a life of a killer whale! Swim over the sea and control killer whale! Survive in an underwater world! Explore the sea, hunt for fish and bring up your Orca with Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D. Control killer whale using finger pads, swim around the sea, hunt and try survival mode! Enjoy Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D. Don't get lost in the vast underwater! Hunt as an Orca and have fun with this survival simulatior!

Great Orca simulator for everyone who wants to explore underwater! Try Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D today! Hunt as an Orca and swim over the sea!

Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D features:

Play as a killer whale (Orca), swim over the sea
Realistic survival simulator
Hunt for fish and enjoy sea views
Explore underwater as an Orca!

Try Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D and explore underwater! Swim as an Orca, hunt fish to survive, don't forget about the oxygen and grow up! Try this survival game! Enjoy being an Orca with this amazing Killer Whale: Sea Simulator 3D game!
